mapper.sql: id, shangbaoid, chuliren, chulitime, chulimiaoshu, shenheren, shenhetime, shenhemiaoshu, shenheState, attachment_source, createId, createTime, delflag
mapper.insert: insert into countryside_chuli ( id, shangbaoid, chuliren, chulitime, chulimiaoshu, attachment_source, createId, createTime, delflag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shangbaoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chuliren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chulitime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{chulimiaoshu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentSource,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into countryside_chuli
id,
shangbaoid,
chuliren,
chulitime,
chulimiaoshu,
attachment_source,
createId,
createTime,
delflag,

mapper.select:
select count(1) from countryside_chuli where delflag = 'A'
and yhzh like concat('%', #{page.yhzh}, '%')

select
from countryside_chuli where delflag = 'A'
and yhzh like concat('%', #{page.yhzh}, '%')
order by createTime desc limit #{page.start},#{page.pageSize}
mapper.update: update countryside_chuli set delflag = 'D' where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update countryside_chuli set shangbaoid = #{shangbaoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chuliren = #{chuliren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chulitime = #{chulitime,jdbcType=DATE}, chulimiaoshu = #{chulimiaoshu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shenheren = #{shenheren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shenhetime = #{shenhetime,jdbcType=DATE}, shenhemiaoshu = #{shenhemiaoshu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shenheState = #{shenheState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into countryside_chuli (shangbaoid, chuliren, chulitime, chulimiaoshu, shenheState, attachment_source, createId, createTime, delflag) values (#{shangbaoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chuliren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chulitime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{chulimiaoshu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shenheState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update countryside_chuli set delflag = 'D' where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from countryside_chuli where
shangbaoid like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%')

select
from countryside_chuli where
shangbaoid like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%')
order by createTime desc limit #{page.start},#{page.pageSize}
select id,shenhe,shenhemiaoshu,shenhetime from countryside_chuli where id = #{id}
